definition[0]: a business activity which involves collecting information about what goods people buy and why they buy them
example[0]: They had to conduct market research, then advertise the product.
definition[1]: the activities involved in obtaining information about a particular market, including how much of a product is being sold, who is buying it, why they are buying it etc, or information about what people might buy
example[1]: Market research showed ‘good potential’ for marketing the aftershave to Hispanic men.
